## circumCenter2 variable

Computes and returns the center of the circumcircle of the given 2D triangle points. Returns `undefined` if the points are colinear or coincident.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
circumCenter2: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, c: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, eps?: number) => number[] | undefined
```
